etymology.interpretation: Emphasizes milk that is newly obtained or minimally processed, retaining a fresh taste. Often contrasts with UHT/long-life milk or milk powder.
etymology.simplification: 鮮 was simplified to 鲜 by reducing the fish radical 魚 to 鱼 while keeping 羊; 奶 is unchanged.

examples.chinese: 我喜欢喝鲜奶(我喜歡喝鮮奶)。
examples.english: I like to drink fresh milk.

examples.chinese: 这家店每天清晨送来鲜奶(這家店每天清晨送來鮮奶)。
examples.pinyin: Zhè jiā diàn měitiān qīngchén sòng lái xiānnǎi.
examples.english: This shop delivers fresh milk every morning.

examples.chinese: 请把鲜奶放进冰箱(請把鮮奶放進冰箱)。
examples.pinyin: Qǐng bǎ xiānnǎi fàng jìn bīngxiāng.
examples.english: Please put the fresh milk in the refrigerator.
